{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3550168,"name":"Brennyn","username":"Prinkle","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/prinkle/{size}/258824_2.png","created_at":"2025-03-07T03:51:39.727Z","cooked":"

For some reason CD wont let me upload a video but we noticed a new sound coming from a Kraken today. for context we have 2 X60s powering our elevator. one stopped moving and started doing a alternating strobe orange status light, while it was doing this it made a ticking sound. after a few seconds of this it would switch to the red and orange “damaged hardware” status lights and would sound like a ambulance siren. I’ve already emailed CTRE about it but wondering if this has happened to anyone else.

I don’t personally have experience with CTRE motor controllers, but any chance its the stall whistle?

Swerve weird beeping noise

That beep is commonly known as the stall whistle, and is an indicator that a motor is being stalled. This is safe to ignore if you are expecting it, and are properly ensuring your gearing is such that you are putting minimal load on the motor.

no it’s not a stall. i will see if i can get a video here though
